content.purpose: Implement document type specific renderers for the Markdown preview.

userStories.description: As a user, I want to see progress documents rendered with status, completion, and task lists.
As a user, I want to see active context documents rendered with current work, changes, decisions, etc.
As a user, I want to see branch context documents rendered with purpose and user stories.

content.additionalNotes: Focusing on clear and concise presentation for each document type.
